song_screen.no_bands: You're not in any bands at the moment.
song_screen.clone_placeholder: Select the band you want to clone this song to.
song_screen.confirm_clone: Do you want to clone the song to the selected band?
song_screen.save_song_placeholder: Enter the data to save a new song
song_screen.import_placeholder: If the song is available on Cifra Club or Cifras.com enter the link to the song and we will format it for you.
song_screen.url_placeholder: Embeeded url for youtube or spotify
song_screen.web_warning: NOTE: It is recommended to edit the song and its notes in chordpro format using the WEB version of the application as your experience with the music editor will be better.
song_screen.song_placeholder: Insert the song in chordpro format

profile.peding_confirmation: Please validate your E-mail address. If you didn't received the E-mail click on resend E-mail to receive one.
profile.confirm_wipe: Be sure to check that you're not a band leader. If you are, transfer the leadership to another member, otherwise the band and the songs saved in that band will be removed and it may happen that there are third parties using your band's public songs in their performances.
profile.new_invite_message: You were invited to join a band: {{name}}.
profile.validate_mail_placeholder: Enter the code you received in your email to finish your account validation.
profile.validate_mail_label: Type the code received in your E-mail:
profile.you_were_invited: You've been asked to join a band. View the band details below and decide whether to accept or decline.

auth.password_redefinition_description: Type your E-mail and if an account exists we will send an url to your E-mail address containing the password reset url.

band_screen.no_categories: There is no registered categories in this band.
band_screen.category_placeholder: Click to manage the given category.
band_screen.no_concerts: There is no concerts in this band.
band_screen.concert_placeholder: Search for concerts in this band:
band_screen.no_songs: There is no songs in this band.
band_screen.song_placeholder: Search for songs in this band:
band_screen.category_warning: This band has no saved categories! Create at least one to save songs.
band_screen.no_members: There is no active users with the current filter.
band_screen.invite_placeholder: Click in a musician in the list to invite to your band.
band_screen.no_songs_category: There is no songs saved in this category.
band_screen.remove_category_warning: This category has nested songs! Unbound them to be able to delete this category.

bands_screen.description: List of bands you associate in.

main_screen.pending_concerts: You have {{count}} pending concerts to attend.
main_screen.no_pending_concerts: There is no pending concerts to attend.
main_screen.no_bands: You have no band afiliations at the moment.

songs_screen.no_public_songs: There is no songs published at the moment.

success_msgs.title: Success!
success_msgs.demote_msg: The selected integrant is now a band member!
success_msgs.promote_msg: The selected integrant is now a band admin!
success_msgs.remove_member_msg: The selected integrant was removed from the band!
success_msgs.owner_transfer_msg: The selected integrant is now the band owner!
success_msgs.invite_msg: The selected musician was invited to join your band!
success_msgs.save_band_without_logo_msg: The band was successfully saved but an error ocourred while uploading your logo image.
success_msgs.remove_category_msg: The selected category was successfully deleted!
success_msgs.confirmation_mail_msg: An E-mail containing the reset url was sent.
success_msgs.account_created_msg: Hello {{name}} Your account was successfully created!
success_msgs.wipe_msg: Your account was successfully deleted from the app! We hope to see you again in the future.
success_msgs.email_validation_msg: Your E-mail address was successfully validated!
success_msgs.save_profile_msg: Your account data was successfully saved.
success_msgs.save_profile_without_avatar_msg: Your account data was successfully saved but an error ocourred while uploading your avatar image.
success_msgs.clone_song_msg: The song was successfully cloned to selected band!
success_msgs.song_import_msg: The song was successfully imported from {{name}}

error_msgs.demote_denied_msg: You lack permissions to manage member roles!
error_msgs.demote_error_msg: An error has ocourred while demoting the selected member! Try again later.

error_msgs.promote_error_msg: An error has ocourred while promoting the selected member! Try again later.

error_msgs.band_remove_error: An error has ocourred while deleting the band! Try again later.

error_msgs.invalid_form_msg: There is invalid dat in your form. Please verify it.
error_msgs.save_band_error_msg: An error has ocourred while saving the band! Try again later.
error_msgs.remove_category_denied_msg: You lack permissions in the band to remove categories!
error_msgs.remove_category_error_msg: An error has ocourred while removing the category! Try again later.

error_msgs.save_category_error_msg: An error has ocourred while saving the category! Try again later.
error_msgs.email_already_taken_msg: This E-mail address is already in use by another account.

error_msgs.username_in_use_msg: Username or E-mail already in use by another account!
error_msgs.username_error_msg: An error ocourred while creating your account. Try again later!
